metadata.title: CVE-2024-35945 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: phy: phy_device: Prevent nullptr exceptions on ISRIf phydev->irq is set unconditionally, checkfor valid interrupt handler or fall back to polling mode to preventnullptr exceptions in interrupt service routine.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
